products.description: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes are ultra-soft, alcohol-free, micellar-infused face wipes that gently dissolve makeup, oil, dirt, sweat, sunscreen, and even waterproof mascara in one easy step for clean, fresh-looking skin every day. Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. Made with 100% plant-based fibers, these compostable, biodegradable wipes break down in home compost within 35 days for sustainable skincare. Manufactured in the USA, Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes deliver reliable makeup removal and gentle cleansing power wherever you need it. These face wipes for women makeup remover needs and men are ideal for morning and evening skincare routines, removing impurities and pollution without harsh rubbing. Use as micellar water wipes for a refreshing cleanse after workouts or while traveling. Enjoy the confidence of knowing your skin is left clean, soft, and residue-free, with eco-friendly packaging that supports a sustainable lifestyle. Choose Neutrogena for trusted, effective, and gentle makeup remover wipes that combine convenience, performance, and environmental responsibility in every use.

products.description: PanOxyl Acne Foaming Wash is the Number One Best-Selling Acne Wash in the U.S.* (*data on file). Clear, treat, and prevent even the worst breakouts with PanOxyl 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Maximum Strength Acne Foaming Wash. This cleanser for acne-prone skin can be used on both the face and body. This daily antimicrobial cleanser contains 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, the highest concentration available without a prescription. This powerful daily face and body wash starts working quickly to clear acne and kills over 99% of acne-causing bacteria in 15 seconds (*Independent lab study, data on file). This treatment for pimples effectively penetrates pores, killing the bacteria that cause acne to clear existing acne blemishes and preventing new blemishes from forming. products.product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream, Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides, Daily Moisturizer, Oil-Free, Fragrance Free, Non-Comedogenic, 19 Ounce
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
EVEN OUT UNEVEN SKIN TONE — Unlock the power of a transparent collagen jelly cream designed to specifically target and target uneven skin tone. Reveal a more harmonious, luminous complexion for a naturally smooth and radiant look.
PRODUCT BENEFITS — Quickly reveals a more radiant, refreshed complexion with the ‘Korean Glass Glow’ effect post-application. Dermatologist-tested, low-irritating, silicone-free, maintains a skin-friendly pH of 5.69–7.69, and is free from artificial color.
KEY INGREDIENTS — Hydrolyzed Collagen: Smaller segments enable better skin absorption, preserving firmness and elasticity. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Supports the skin's barrier function and boosts hydration for improved texture.
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED — Skin firmness improved by 1.793% and sagging skin by 2.488% after 24 hours. *The above information pertains only to the characters of the raw materials *Clinical Trial Tested by the Global Dermatological Research Institute.' / Results may vary depending on individual skin types.
HOW TO APPLY — Apply a quarter amount of jelly cream morning and evening to the face and décolletage (neck & chest), after using targeted serums that address your individual skin concerns.

products.product_name: medicube PDRN Pink Peptide Serum with Salmon DNA | Pink Glow Serum with Peptides & Niacinamide for Hydration & Firm-Looking Skin | Uneven Tone Care | Korean Skincare, 1.01 fl. Oz

products.description:
KOREAN GLASS GLOW SKIN: This pink glow serum targets dull skin and boosts elasticity, helping to prevent future breakouts while enhancing the skin's glow and resilience.
SALMON DNA PDRN: Salmon DNA PDRN is a form of DNA extracted from salmon. It stimulates skin renewal and repair, giving your skin a clearer, more luminous complexion. It promotes a more even skin tone and a natural glow by improving skin health.
KEY INGREDIENTS: Containing Salmon DNA PDRN, five types of peptide complex, niacinamide, adenosine, and Ocimum Sanctum (Holy Basil) leaf extract, this formula provides effective care for uneven skin tone and elasticity.
LONG LASTING HYDRATION: Strengthens the skin’s barrier function, enhancing its resistance to external aggressors and pollutants. It provides deep hydration and smooths skin texture.
MILD FORMULA LIGHT TEXTURE: The formula is mild and gentle for all skin types—gentle enough to be used daily. Dermatologist-tested, low-irritating, and free from gluten and artificial colors.

GUARANTEED RESULTS OR YOUR MONEY BACK. We proudly stand behind every product we make. That's why all O'Keeffe's products have a 100%, money-back guarantee. products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Lips > Lip Stains
products.description:
Peel-off lip stain masque that lasts all day. Wonder Blading Peel and Reveal locks in color for a matte nude finish: waterproof, smudge proof so you skip touch-ups through drinks, meals, commutes, and workouts.
Matte nude lip stain and lip tint powered by Wonder Blading technology (Liquid Blading) fuses pigment into the top lip layer for locked-in color—no feathering, fading and budge-free. Long lasting, high-pigment, non-drying, kiss-proof wear with clean edges
1-Step Stain & Go - Achieving a low-maintenance, long-wear look has never been easier with our Lip Stain Masque. Apply the Lip Stain Masque and let it set for 10 - 30 seconds, then wipe away with a damp towel or tissue. You’ll be left with a natural lip stain that won’t budge or fade throughout the day, even when eating or drinking.
Buildable Lip Stain or Lip Liner Stain - Wear it all over for bold color or apply just to the edges as a lip liner stain. Re-apply for more vibrance, then remove easily with any oil-based makeup remover.
13 Universally Flattering Shades - We offer the perfect shade for everyone and every occasion, including nude lip stain, pink lip stain, and even a bold red lip stain. Our lip tints are universally flattering, with soft fresh tints that suit any skin tone. And our lip makeup is designed to last, providing a lip stain long lasting formula that won’t fade or budge throughout the day.

products.product_name: Al-Rehab Choco Musk Eau de Parfum Spray for Women, 1.65 oz/50 ml
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Eau de Parfum
products.description: Choco Musk is not just a fragrance; it's a delicate dance of sweet shades that captivates the senses. The delightful aroma begins with the chic allure of white musk, falling under the spell of incomparable white chocolate. Each note in the composition complements the other, creating a harmonious blend that emphasizes without overwhelming. As the fragrance unfolds, the middle notes gently merge, introducing spicy cinnamon, creamy vanilla, and the enchanting essence of rose. The base notes add a touch of oriental mystique, with exciting amber and myrrh weaving together with a noble sandalwood tint. The result is a sweet harmony that plays with shades of dessert perfumes in all their splendor. Choco Musk is a delicacy that transcends seasons, inviting you into a fairy-tale captivity of sweet indulgence. Whether it's the warmth of summer or the coziness of winter, let this fragrance be your year-round temptation, teasing and charming those around you. The 50ml Eau de Parfum bottle is an elegant testament to the luxurious experience that awaits you. With its refined design, it complements the richness of the fragrance within, enhancing the overall indulgence. Choco Musk isn't just a fragrance; it's a captivating tale of sweet temptation. Let it be your daily indulgence, a sensory journey into the heart of dessert-inspired luxury.
features: Choco Musk Eau de Parfum by Al-Rehab is a Aromatic fragrance for women
Top Notes: White Musk, Milk Chocolate and Vanilla
Middle Notes: Cinnamon, Rose and Sandalwood
Base Notes: Myrrh, Amber And Spicy Notes
Long lasting fragrance

products.description:
ALT Crystal, inspired by the iconic Baccarat Rouge 540 perfume, is bold, unflinching, and designed to grab attention without compromise. Crystal features exotic notes of rich jasmine and saffron, combined with the warm tone of cedarwood and subtle amber gris. The result? A fragrance ideal for both work and play, with complex, multi-layered scents that adapt to your skin as day turns to night.
Whether you’re looking for an eau de parfum that’s strong, intoxicating, and creates an instant impact when you walk into a room or exploring sample perfumes for women, ALT Crystal 23 perfume for women and men is your perfect choice. Made in the USA, this unisex perfume is a natural choice for those who seek a scent that’s as versatile as it is captivating. Experience the essence of Maison Francis Kurkdjian's legendary Baccarat Rouge 540 perfume for men and women in every spritz of ALT Crystal 23.
Concentration: Extrait de Parfum.
Disclaimer: ALT. Fragrances competes with the designer brand. It does not use their fragrances and is not associated in any way with the designer brands or their manufacturers. All trademarks are property of their respective owners. The designer/brand name is solely used for comparison purposes and to give customers an idea of each fragrance's character and scent accords. We do not present our fragrances as exact copies. We are in compliance with the Federal Trade Commission's statement of policy regarding comparative advertising.
features: Inspired Creation: Crystal by ALT Fragrances is a testament to the ingenuity of its inspiration, by Francis K. Baccarat Rouge 540 perfume, offering a unique yet familiar olfactory experience.

Layered Sophistication: Starting with a bold amber wood, transitioning to the sweet sophistication of jasmine and cedar, and finishing with a delightful candy floss-like sweetness, ALT Crystal 23 is an evolving aromatic journey, perfect as perfume samples for women and men.
Perfectly Balanced: ALT Perfume composition ensures a perfect balance of sweetness and lightness, making it an ideal fragrance for both intimate settings and broader social occasions.
High-Quality Long Lasting Fragrance: More than just a dupe, Crystal replicates the depth and spice of Baccarat Rouge 540 perfume with subtle nuances that make it a standout on its own.

Signature Scent: Embrace Crystal as your go-to fragrance, a perfect blend of luxury and affordability that allows everyone to experience the allure of a high-quality perfume. Discover the allure with ALT Crystal No 23 perfume for women and men.

Whether you’re freshening up post-workout or starting your day, this mist’s warm, sweet aura will draw compliments without ever being overpowering. Clean, Vegan Ingredients: Feel good knowing this fragrance is made with care. Pacifica uses natural and essential oils to create our true-to-life scents. It’s a clean beauty pick that lets you enjoy a luxurious scent without guilt or irritation – perfect for those with sensitive skin or anyone prioritizing clean ingredients. products.product_name: Swiss Arabian Layali Rouge - Luxury Products From Dubai - Long Lasting Personal Perfume Oil Fragrance - A Seductive Signature Aroma - 0.5 Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Eau de Parfum
products.description: Layali Rouge has all the fun and frolics of a cocktail. Opening with sweet and juicy mango, pineapple, lemon, papaya and florals, the tropical opening sets the tone for the fabulous night ahead. The fruity notes are soon joined by a burst of hypnotic roses and juicy peaches, before hibiscus and coconut catch the breeze and bring it all to a rich night time finale. Niche perfumery is a state of mind. Its perfumes circumvent the laws imposed by marketing and fall outside of the traditional commercial channels. Artisan fragrances are not developed based on a marketing study conducted by commercial brands, but originate from the imagination and artistic sensibility of a perfumer. Enjoy our wonderfully unique, luxury personal fragrances, made with only the highest quality ingredients. At Swiss Arabian, our expertise and passion, our knowledge of legendary Arabian perfumery, oriental craftsmanship and contemporary elegance, all come together to create fragrances that capture your imagination and celebrate your true essence. The history of Swiss Arabian is an enchanting tale that spans over 40 years. This pioneer in Arabian perfumes was founded in the year 1974 by a visionary with a wealth of knowledge and a deep passion for perfumery. Today, Swiss Arabian is the first perfume manufacturer in the UAE. We operate five modern manufacturing facilities spread across an area of 165,000 sq. ft., producing more than 35 million perfumes annually and export to over 80 countries.
features: LAYALI ROUGE: YOUR NEW SIGNATURE SCENT. Opens with finest notes of Papaya and uplifting Lemon. The beating heart of the fragrance brings out the deep resonance of Peach and Rose. Coconut and Hibiscus add depth to the aroma and inspire attention.

INTENSELY CONCENTRATED PERSONAL AROMAS. A more traditional approach to perfumery from the Middle East. Experience our exquisite and exclusive range of handmade perfume oils in traditional attar style. For an intense and long lasting aroma projection.

PURE QUALITY, ALCOHOL FREE FORMULATION. Perfect for sensitive skin types, our alcohol-free perfume oils are hypoallergenic and won't irritate skin. These all natural, hand crafted oils are safe for all and feature expertly curated fragrance notes.

THE PERFECT MIX OF CULTURES AND PERFUMES. Carrying a legacy rooted in a blend of Western & Oriental craftsmanship, Swiss Arabian is a brand founded on duality that proudly celebrates the space in which two seemingly opposite worlds come together.

AN AROMATIC EXPERIENCE FROM ACROSS THE SEAS. Born from precious beginnings and built on achievements aplenty, our exquisite creations will lead you on an aromatic journey of the senses that culminates in an impeccable moment that enchants forever.

products.description:
Beetles No Wipe Top Coat and Base Coat: Enjoy long-lasting wear for over 28 days with a perfect shine. The flexible top coat prevents nicks, chips, and smudges. Tip: The base coat is designed to remain sticky, providing a solid foundation for the next coat of polish. (Note: The base gel should not be used as glue.)
High-Quality and Protective: Beetles Glossy No Wipe Top Coat and base, with proper application, can last with a perfect shine. The flexible top coat avoids nicks, chips, or smudges. Ideal Mother's Day gifts for her. Tips: Avoid touching your nails after curing the top coat for 2 minutes to enhance the shine.
Easy Application and Good Tenacity:If you have sensitive skin, we recommend using this product in conjunction with Liquid Peel off Latex Tape. This tape minimizes direct skin contact with the gel, reducing the chance of allergic reactions. It also helps in achieving more precise nail art. Please note that Liquid Peel off Latex Tape is not included with this product and must be purchased separately.
Reminder: In low temperatures, the base coat may become clumpy or thick, which can cause the brush to break off inside the bottle. If this happens, please contact us for satisfactory after-sales service. Tip: There's no need to wipe off the tacky residue of the base coat, as it helps the color coat adhere longer to your nails.If you feel a burning sensation during curing, it is recommended to remove your hand from the lamp. Resume curing once the sensation returns to normal.
Tips for preventing nail surface peeling off:(1) Polishing of the nail surface: Polish the front, side and trailing edge of the nail until there are no reflective spots on the nail surface(2) Nail surface cleaning: It is recommended to use Nail dehydrator to remove oil and moisture from the nail surface(3)Lighting time: It is recommended that the lighting time for base Coat, Color Gel and Top Coat at least 60 seconds.

products.description:
Callus Remover for Feet – Get convenient salon-quality foot care. Our professional-grade callus remover gel softens and dissolves thick calluses and dead skin, making it easy to maintain smooth, healthy feet from the comfort of your home.
Fast-Acting Foot Callus Remover - See results in just 3 to 5 minutes. Perfect for pairing with a foot soak, bath, or tub—simply apply and gently buff with your favorite foot scrubber or pumice stone for instantly smoother heels and soles.
New Precision Applicator + Gloves Included - Our upgraded nozzle allows for clean, targeted application—no drips, no mess. Plus, we include protective gloves with every bottle so you can safely apply the gel with confidence and control.
Advanced Formula for Tough, Dry Skin - Powered by skin-renewing ingredients like mint and glycerin, this potent gel penetrates thick, dry layers to break down stubborn calluses. Leaves feet feeling soft, refreshed, and sandal-ready.
Product Ingredients: Water, glycerin, mint, fragrance.

products.description:
💎PACKAGE CONTENT -- The package includes 1 box with 24 grids, featuring a variety of colors, approx. 32000 pcs of 3mm bling-out resin rhinestones (Mixed-Color). 1 tweezers and 1 pickup pen are included for easily picking up of rhinestones. 3 B7000 adhesive jewels glue for jewelry making. 💎VIBRANT GEMS FOR CRAFTS -- Made of choice resin, these crystals are lightweight, durable, and economical. The AB coating is firmly combined on the outer surface of each rhinestone, which can have different color performances under different light or different refraction angles, providing long-lasting sparkle. Their perfect cutting facets, delicate and exquisite shine will make your handicrafts more dazzling and eye-catching.
💎B7000 CLEAR GLUE FOR GEMS -- Our B7000 glue has strong adhesion and dries clear, non-toxic and harmless to the skin.The glue has a precision needle for easy application, initial cure time is 3-5 minutes and full cure time is 24 hours. The glue will have a slight overflow when first used, before use you can leave the glue head up for a few minutes to avoid overflow. After use, the needle needs to be wiped with an alcohol pad.
💎WIDE APPLICATION -- These sparkling iridescent resin rhinestones are perfect for creating dazzling looks. Use them for bedazzling crafts or nail art and more. Apply it to what you want to bling!
💎HIGHLIGHTS -- Our store also offers a variety of colors and sizes of resin rhinestones, these colors will give your crafts more possiblities, more shiny color scheme. A sufficient amount of resin gems are suitable for paving large area designs such as diamond paintings or cups. By choosing resin rhinestones with similar or contrasting colors, you can create color-coordinated or highly contrasting works, such as phone cases with gradient effect or colourful festival decorations.

products.product_name: BASED Hair Texturizing Powder, Lightweight & Volumizing Hair Styling Powder with Matte Finish, Add Texture to Hair with Medium Hold, For Short to Medium Hair, (1.69oz Bottle, 2.5 Gram Fill, Pack of 1)
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Styling Products > Root Lifting Powders
products.description:
LIGHTWEIGHT TEXTURE POWDER: Unlike heavy gels or pastes, our Texture Powder is lightweight, volumizing and easy to apply. We formulated our powder to instantly add volume with a clean matte finish by absorbing any excess oil.
SHORT TO MEDIUM HAIR TYPE: To provide proper hold and volume, our texture powder is best for hair under 6 inches in length.
HOW TO USE: With your hand at least 2 inches from your head, apply 3-4 pumps of powder to dry hair. Use your fingers to evenly distribute the powder throughout your hair. If you need more hold, add some more product.
CONVENIENT SPRAY BOTTLE DESIGN: The spray bottle design allows you to get a consistent amount of powder every time. Simply take off the cap, pump, and style. No more making messes with shaker bottles.
QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Our Hair Texturizing Powder is 100% vegan and cruelty free. Made in The United States with no Sulfates, Parabens, or Phthalates. We only use 5 ingredients: Silica Silylate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Silica, Mica, & Maranta Arundinacea Root Extract so you know exactly what you’re putting in your hair.

products.product_name: Lebanta Raw Batana Oil for Hair Growth - 100% Pure, Organic 4oz Batana from Honduras for Thick and Strong Natural Hair - Dr. Sebi Unrefined Cold Pressed Cosmetic Scalp Mask Gifts for Women (1 Pack)
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Scalp Treatments
products.description:
Transform Your Hair: Our batana oil is crafted using 100% pure, organic ingredients, and handled with care by the Miskito people of Honduras. We use a traditional cold press method to naturally enhance the beauty and health of your hair.
Achieve Your Dream Hair: Recommended by renowned herbalist Dr Sebi, our cold-pressed natural oil promotes hair growth and turns dull, dry hair into thick, shiny strands. Our hair growth oil is ideal for those looking to reverse hair thinning and fill in patchy areas.
Hair Nourishment: Our hair growth oil strengthens follicles, enhances shine, while combating dryness, frizz and split ends. Enriched with nutrients this hair mask nourishes and repairs while promoting strong, vibrant hair growth.
Scalp Rejuvenation: Say goodbye to dry hair with our raw batana oils deep moisturizing properties! This hair mask infuses your scalp with nutrients, delivering everlasting softness and shine. This means your hair is not just growing but glowing!
Easy Application: Massage a generous amount of batana oil into your scalp for 3-5 minutes, leave it on for 20 minutes, then rinse. For the best results, use daily to repair, strengthen, and protect your hair. Enjoy the earthy aroma and watch your hair transform!

products.description: Introducing the CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo, hair care solution developed with dermatologists to ensure the gentle care for your scalp and hair. This shampoo is formulated to cleanse your hair without disrupting your scalp barrier, making it an ideal choice for those with sensitive scalp. Shampoo for women and men. The CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo is an allergy-tested formula. Shampoo is free from sulfates, MIT, dyes, parabens, and fragrances, ensuring a gentle yet effective cleansing experience. It is suitable for all hair types, including various curl patterns and color-treated hair. This gentle shampoo removes buildup from the scalp and hair while maintaining moisture, leaving your hair looking healthy and feeling soft. Shampoo with three skin-identical ceramides, niacinamide, and hyaluronic acid , helps support the scalp's natural barrier and maintain moisture balance. Can be used as a shampoo for color treated hair. This moisturizing shampoo is pH balanced and is designed to be gentle on both the scalp and hair, making it suitable for daily use For best results, use the CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo with the CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Conditioner. This combination will leave your hair feeling soft, nourished, and moisturized. Hair care for women and men. To use, apply the shampoo to wet hair and scalp, massage into a rich lather, and rinse thoroughly. Follow with the conditioner for best results. Avoid direct contact with eyes, and if contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Experience the difference with CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo, where science meets care, providing you with a gentle yet effective solution for maintaining healthy looking, beautiful hair. *In a consumer test, after one use of gentle hydrating shampoo + conditioner **system vs. non-conditioning shampoo

products.product_name: Men’s Rogaine 5% Minoxidil for Men Foam, Clinically Proven Regrowth for Thinning Hair, Topical Hair Loss Treatment, Unscented Topical Aerosol, Results in 8–16 Weeks, 3-Month Supply, 3 x 2.11 oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Hair Loss Products > Hair Regrowth Treatments
products.description: Men’s Rogaine minoxidil for men foam is a clinically proven topical aerosol hair regrowth treatment featuring a 5% minoxidil formula to reactivate hair follicles and help regrow fuller, thicker hair. Designed for the early stages of thinning at the vertex (top of the scalp), this unscented minoxidil for men foam leverages Tricho-Prime Technology—a blend of botanical extracts, nourishing emollients, and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA)—to condition and gently exfoliate the scalp, help keep follicles open, and create an optimal environment for hair growth. Clinical studies show noticeable new hair regrowth in 12 weeks with consistent twice-daily use; individual timelines vary, and you may notice early signs between weeks 8–12 with fuller benefits around week 16. Because response can vary, you may experience initial shedding as weaker hairs make way for new growth; maintain consistent application to see the best results over time. products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

The included brush head cap keeps it clean and compact for travel —no bulky storage case needed. Less charging, more moments of fresh cleanliness anywhere.

products.description:
Generous Capacity Warmer: This spacious bathroom essential can easily accommodate two extra-large 40" x 70" bath towels, along with robes, blankets, pajamas, and more. Alternatively, it can hold around 5 medium-sized bath towels. With dimensions of 11.53" in length, 11.53" in width, and 19" in height, it boasts a total capacity of 20 liters, making it ideal for family use. Elevate your home with a spa-like touch.You can safely heat cotton materials, but please refrain from heating chemical fiber towels or clothing, as well as any materials that are not heat-resistant.Do not use it to dry wet towels or other damp items.
Experience Swift Heating: With a simple process, just place your towels within the warmer, shut the lid, and press the WORK button. The 450W heating element ensures even warming, bringing your towels to a cozy temperature within 25 minutes. Use the TIMER button to choose a preservation time between 1 to 4 hours, guaranteeing a supply of warm towels whenever desired. Immerse yourself in a spa-like oasis right in your own bathroom.Upon startup, the built-in timer defaults to 30 minutes. If you wish to keep it on for 30 minutes, there is no need for set. The indicator light will automatically illuminate once the 30-minute insulation mode is activated.
Safety at the Core: Safety is paramount, which is why our ETL-certified towel warmer features a wooden lid and a fire-resistant, eco-friendly plastic exterior that poses no allergenic risks to the body. The triple-layer temperature control mechanism automatically shuts off the heater if the internal bucket temperature becomes too high, effectively preventing any potential overheating issues. Enjoy the warmth indoors with complete peace of mind, relishing in your spa-inspired experience.Please take note of the bucket body indicator: It is unsafe to touch the interior of the device when the hot surface indicator light is on.
A Remarkable Gift: This versatile towel warmer serves as the ultimate accessory for various settings, including homes, pools, showers, hotels, salons, spas, massages, baby care, and elderly care. Once you've indulged in the luxury of warm towels, you'll be treated to a delightful surprise after every bath. It's a thoughtful and considerate gift choice for housewarmings, weddings, showers, birthdays, anniversaries, and countless other occasions.
Our After Sale Service: FLYHIT After Sale Service: Our friendly and reliable customer service will respond to you within 24 hours. You can purchase with confidence, with our 30-day return and 12-month replacement.

products.product_name: Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere Men's Razor with Dual Lubrication and Precision Trimmer, 17 Piece Set, 1 Handle & 16 Cartridges, Black
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Shave & Hair Removal > Men's > Razors & Blades > Cartridge Razors
products.description: Amazon Basics 5-Blade MotionSphere Razor for Men features a multi pivot design to follow the contours of your face and a beard trimmer for shaving goatee, sideburns and under nose. The razor cartridge is hypoallergenic, includes a lubricating strip with vitamin E, and has an anti-clog design for quick rinse. To load refill cartridge, push razor handle into a cartridge as it sits in the dispenser until it clicks. Cartridges fit Amazon Basics Razor Handles only; does not fit other brands. INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Prepare: Wash your face with warm water to remove dirt and oils. Apply a pre-shave oil (optional). 2. Lather: Apply shaving cream or gel to your face using a brush or directly with your hands. 3. Shave: Use a razor to shave in the direction of hair growth, using short and light strokes, rinsing the razor frequently. For a closer shave, you can reapply shaving cream/gel and shave against the grain (opposite direction of hair growth). However, be cautious as this may increase the risk of skin irritation or ingrown hairs. 4. Soothe: Rinse your face, pat dry, and apply an aftershave lotion or balm to moisturize and soothe the skin. 5. Store: Shake off excess water after use and store your razor in a clean, dry place.
features: 5-blade MotionSphere razor handle and 16 refill cartridges
Hypoallergenic lubricating strips with Vitamin E to help reduce skin irritation

MotionSphere multi axis pivot follows the contours of the face

products.description: PanOxyl Acne Foaming Wash is the Number One Best-Selling Acne Wash in the U.S.* (*data on file). This daily antimicrobial cleanser contains 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, the highest concentration available without a prescription. This powerful daily face and body wash starts working quickly to clear acne and kills over 99% of acne-causing bacteria in 15 seconds (*Independent lab study, data on file). This treatment for pimples effectively penetrates pores, killing the bacteria that cause acne to clear existing acne blemishes and preventing new blemishes from forming. PanOxyl products use high-quality, scientifically proven ingredients to banish breakouts without a prescription, so you can be your clearest, most confident you.

products.product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream, Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides, Daily Moisturizer, Oil-Free, Fragrance Free, Non-Comedogenic, 19 Ounce
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.description:
EXCEPTIONAL BODY PERFECTOR: Available in 6 buildable shades, this innovative leg & body foundation instantly evens your skin tone and conceals everything from stretch marks, dark spots and scars to veins and tattoos for an illuminated, natural-looking glow; the versatile formula is also a great alternative to self tanner
24-HOUR WEAR: Unlike traditional leg and body makeup, Body Coverage Perfector is waterproof, sweatproof, transfer-resistant and lasts for more than 24 hours
NATURAL-LOOKING RADIANT FINISH: A combination of treated pigments and light-reflecting minerals suspended in a flexible matrix provide natural-looking coverage that moves with your skin, never feeling heavy or cakey
EXCLUSIVE TECHNOLOGY: Tri-Effects Technology delivers long-lasting coverage that looks and feels like skin; follow the usage instructions below for best results

[24 HOUR WATERPROOF FIX] TIRTIR Waterproof Setting Spray ensures your makeup stays intact for 24 hours, even through sweat, water, and outdoor activities. A powerful, non sticky formula keeps your look fresh and flawless from morning to night.

products.description:
Peel-off lip stain masque that lasts all day. Wonder Blading Peel and Reveal locks in color for a matte nude finish: waterproof, smudge proof so you skip touch-ups through drinks, meals, commutes, and workouts.
Matte nude lip stain and lip tint powered by Wonder Blading technology (Liquid Blading) fuses pigment into the top lip layer for locked-in color—no feathering, fading and budge-free. Long lasting, high-pigment, non-drying, kiss-proof wear with clean edges
1-Step Stain & Go - Achieving a low-maintenance, long-wear look has never been easier with our Lip Stain Masque. Apply the Lip Stain Masque and let it set for 10 - 30 seconds, then wipe away with a damp towel or tissue. You’ll be left with a natural lip stain that won’t budge or fade throughout the day, even when eating or drinking.
Buildable Lip Stain or Lip Liner Stain - Wear it all over for bold color or apply just to the edges as a lip liner stain. Re-apply for more vibrance, then remove easily with any oil-based makeup remover.
13 Universally Flattering Shades - We offer the perfect shade for everyone and every occasion, including nude lip stain, pink lip stain, and even a bold red lip stain. Our lip tints are universally flattering, with soft fresh tints that suit any skin tone. And our lip makeup is designed to last, providing a lip stain long lasting formula that won’t fade or budge throughout the day.

products.description:
MULTICOLOR: Includes three baked neutral eyeshadows in subdued yet vibrant shades; a creamy bronze highlighter that infuses the skin with glamorous warm tones; light gold and champagne shades that instantly highlight with a single swipe; and a creamy peach-pink blush that delivers a naturally sweet flush.
INTENSE COLOR PIGMENTS: Each shade is enriched with highly concentrated pigments for rich, vibrant colors that create a striking and distinctive facial expression, with just one swipe for coverage.
CRAFTSMANSHIP: Highly pigmented powders allow you to mold your features to your heart's content, whether it's a natural look with soft contours or an eye-catching look with bold, dramatic effects.
LONG-LASTING MAKEUP: Using a premium formula, LLASIDO makeup stays vibrant and flawless for hours without fading or smudging, ensuring a perfect look all day long.
HOW TO USE: Eyeshadow: Sweep eyeshadow lightly over the entire eye socket, using darker shades to deepen the layering in the eye socket, and finish with a light highlight under the brow to create dimension. Highlight: Apply highlighter to cheekbones, bridge of nose and cupid's bow to create a natural glow and instantly enhance facial radiance. Blush: Apply blush to the cheeks and smudge for a fresh, vibrant look. Bronzer: Apply bronzing powder to the entire face or swipe it over the temples, cheekbone hollows and jawline to create a warm, contoured look that accentuates facial lines.

Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. Made with 100% plant-based fibers, these compostable, biodegradable wipes break down in home compost within 35 days for sustainable skincare. These face wipes for women makeup remover needs and men are ideal for morning and evening skincare routines, removing impurities and pollution without harsh rubbing. Enjoy the confidence of knowing your skin is left clean, soft, and residue-free, with eco-friendly packaging that supports a sustainable lifestyle. products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Cleansers > Cloths & Towelettes
products.description: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes are ultra-soft, alcohol-free, micellar-infused face wipes that gently dissolve makeup, oil, dirt, sweat, sunscreen, and even waterproof mascara in one easy step for clean, fresh-looking skin every day. Each twin pack includes two 25-count packs (50 wipes total) for daily convenience at home or on the go. These makeup remover wipes feature a triple emollient formula that leaves skin feeling refreshed, nourished, and conditioned with no heavy residue and no need to rinse. Designed for sensitive skin and gentle on the delicate eye area, these face cleansing wipes are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and allergy-tested. The wipes are formulated without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, soaps, alcohols, or dyes, making them suitable for all skin types. Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. Made with 100% plant-based fibers, these compostable, biodegradable wipes break down in home compost within 35 days for sustainable skincare. Manufactured in the USA, Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes deliver reliable makeup removal and gentle cleansing power wherever you need it. These face wipes for women makeup remover needs and men are ideal for morning and evening skincare routines, removing impurities and pollution without harsh rubbing. Use as micellar water wipes for a refreshing cleanse after workouts or while traveling. Enjoy the confidence of knowing your skin is left clean, soft, and residue-free, with eco-friendly packaging that supports a sustainable lifestyle. Choose Neutrogena for trusted, effective, and gentle makeup remover wipes that combine convenience, performance, and environmental responsibility in every use.
features: Twin Pack with 25-count of Neutrogena Makeup Remover Ultra-Soft Micellar Cleansing Wipes to gently cleanse and effectively lift away up to 99% of makeup, including long wear makeup while leaving skin feeling refreshed & conditioned

Makeup remover wipes work to dissolve traces of dirt, remove bacteria, impurities, oil and makeup on skin while also removing pollution, sweat and sunscreen, for superior cleansing and makeup removing power in a convenient disposable wipe

Daily facial cleansing wipes are formulated with a triple emollient blend to gently dissolve makeup and impurities, even waterproof mascara, while conditioning skin. Leaving skin refreshingly clean with no heavy residue. No rinsing required

These facial cleaning wipes are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist- and allergy-tested and formulated without fragrance, parabens, alcohol, sulfates, phthalates, soaps, and dyes. They are gentle enough for daily use, even around the delicate eye area

products.description: PanOxyl Acne Foaming Wash is the Number One Best-Selling Acne Wash in the U.S.* (*data on file). Clear, treat, and prevent even the worst breakouts with PanOxyl 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Maximum Strength Acne Foaming Wash. This cleanser for acne-prone skin can be used on both the face and body. This daily antimicrobial cleanser contains 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, the highest concentration available without a prescription. This powerful daily face and body wash starts working quickly to clear acne and kills over 99% of acne-causing bacteria in 15 seconds (*Independent lab study, data on file). This treatment for pimples effectively penetrates pores, killing the bacteria that cause acne to clear existing acne blemishes and preventing new blemishes from forming. Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
EVEN OUT UNEVEN SKIN TONE — Unlock the power of a transparent collagen jelly cream designed to specifically target and target uneven skin tone. Reveal a more harmonious, luminous complexion for a naturally smooth and radiant look.
PRODUCT BENEFITS — Quickly reveals a more radiant, refreshed complexion with the ‘Korean Glass Glow’ effect post-application. Dermatologist-tested, low-irritating, silicone-free, maintains a skin-friendly pH of 5.69–7.69, and is free from artificial color.
KEY INGREDIENTS — Hydrolyzed Collagen: Smaller segments enable better skin absorption, preserving firmness and elasticity. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Supports the skin's barrier function and boosts hydration for improved texture.
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED — Skin firmness improved by 1.793% and sagging skin by 2.488% after 24 hours. *The above information pertains only to the characters of the raw materials *Clinical Trial Tested by the Global Dermatological Research Institute.' / Results may vary depending on individual skin types.
HOW TO APPLY — Apply a quarter amount of jelly cream morning and evening to the face and décolletage (neck & chest), after using targeted serums that address your individual skin concerns.

products.description:
KOREAN GLASS GLOW SKIN: This pink glow serum targets dull skin and boosts elasticity, helping to prevent future breakouts while enhancing the skin's glow and resilience.
SALMON DNA PDRN: Salmon DNA PDRN is a form of DNA extracted from salmon. It stimulates skin renewal and repair, giving your skin a clearer, more luminous complexion. It promotes a more even skin tone and a natural glow by improving skin health.
KEY INGREDIENTS: Containing Salmon DNA PDRN, five types of peptide complex, niacinamide, adenosine, and Ocimum Sanctum (Holy Basil) leaf extract, this formula provides effective care for uneven skin tone and elasticity.
LONG LASTING HYDRATION: Strengthens the skin’s barrier function, enhancing its resistance to external aggressors and pollutants. It provides deep hydration and smooths skin texture.
MILD FORMULA LIGHT TEXTURE: The formula is mild and gentle for all skin types—gentle enough to be used daily. Dermatologist-tested, low-irritating, and free from gluten and artificial colors.

The Real Snail Essence: Formulated with 96.3% Snail Secretion Filtrate, this essence repairs and rejuvenates the skin from dryness and aging. It improves skin vitality by reducing dullness and soothing dehydrated skin.

Key Ingredient: Snail Secretion Filtrate contains "Mucin"- an EFFECTIVE ingredient for enhanced moisturization. It instantly soothes damaged skin and delivers moisture deep into your skin. Perfect for dehydrated and damaged skin.

products.description:
Deeply Soothing Body Lotion with Magnesium – Packed with Magnesium, this rich body lotion helps relax and revitalize overworked muscles and joints. The fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula makes it ideal for post-activity recovery or as part of your nighttime relaxation routine.
Nighttime Renewal & Relaxation – Unwind before bed with this deeply soothing formula. Gently massage onto legs, feet, and muscles to create a calming ritual that helps your body feel at ease, setting the stage for restful relaxation.
Enhanced with Arnica for Extra Comfort – Formulated with Arnica Extract, a trusted botanical known for its soothing and restorative properties, this lotion provides an added layer of comfort for tired muscles and joints.
Hydrating & Non-Greasy Formula – A nourishing blend of Shea Butter, Grapeseed Oil, Vitamin E, and plant-based butters delivers deep moisture while absorbing quickly—leaving skin feeling soft, smooth, and refreshed.
Made in Texas, Trusted Quality – Dermatologist-tested, hypoallergenic, and proudly produced in our GMP-certified Texas facility. Lab-verified for purity and crafted with care for superior quality.

products.description:
Anti-Aging Effect: Maskiss under eye patches with collagen as an anti-aging component prevent the formation of wrinkles and 24K nano gold with a protective effect helps prevent your skin from sagging.
Puffy Eyes And Dark Circles Treatment: Maskiss under eye patches are highly effective eye skin care treatments that will quickly work against skin aging, flat wrinkles & fine lines, eliminate dark circles, remove puffiness, and speed up the cell and collagen rejuvenation.
Hydrating & Moisturizing: Hyaluronic acid in Maskiss under eye patches helps to hydrate and moisturize your skin, providing a long-lasting effect. You will notice your skin is refreshed and hydrated from the very first application. Reveal a younger-looking you.
Easy To Use: Clean your face and eyes with warm water, then put eye pads under your eyes and press gently to secure them. Keep it for 20 minutes, remove the eye pads and gently pat the remaining essence. Twice a day or at least once a week.
Safe & Effective Ingredients: Infused with a blend of collagen, hyaluronic acids, and a variety of natural plant extracts that deeply repair the eye skin, help soothe, rejuvenate & protect the skin around your gorgeous peepers without any side effects.

Dual-Core Luminous Formula — Features a unique dual core that blends nourishing and brightening care. It melts into the skin to deliver intense hydration and a dewy, radiant glow without stickiness.

Hygienic Travel Essential — Use it anytime, anywhere for an instant moisture boost. The convenient stick format offers a quick, hygienic, and mess-free application, perfect for daily touch-ups.

products.description:
RICH, DEEPLY MOISTURIZING BELLY BUTTER - A thick, luxurious balm designed to provide intense hydration for dry, stretching skin during pregnancy and postpartum. Ideal for overnight use to lock in moisture and comfort.
HELPS SUPPORT SKIN ELASTICITY - Made with organic shea butter, grapeseed oil, and rosehip oil to help keep skin soft, supple, and well-nourished as it stretches and changes. Helps reduce the appearance of stretch marks and scars.
SOOTHES DRY, ITCHY & SENSITIVE SKIN - Calendula and coconut oil help calm irritation and relieve tight, uncomfortable skin caused by a growing belly.
FRAGRANCE-FREE & GENTLE FOR MOM - Free from synthetic fragrance, parabens, petroleum, and harsh chemicals. Suitable for sensitive skin and gentle enough for pregnancy, postpartum, and breastfeeding moms.
AWARD-WINNING, MOM-OWNED BRAND - Irene Organics is a multi-year Parent & Baby Award winner for pregnancy and postpartum skincare. Handcrafted in small batches and packaged in eco-friendly glass jars.

products.description:
BACK TO THE BASICS: Meet our Universal Starter Kit for hydrated, glowing skin. This 5-step routine boosts, build + protects skin, serving as the building blocks to your best skin. Clincally proven to maintain + protect the skin barrier.
HYDRATE + REBUILD: Skin-loving ingredients work to rebuild + protect the skin barrier. Powerful humectants lock in moisture to minimize trans-epidermal water loss (TEWL).
BARRIER-BOOSTING: BYOMA’s carefully researched Tri-Ceramide Complex is designed to mimic and replenish the essential lipids found in skin. Formulated to rebuild the skin barrier + restore moisture levels, ensuring skin functions at its best every day.
THE ULTIMATE SKIN-COMPATIBLE SOLUTION: Dermatologist tested + approved skin care, soap-free, non-comedogenic, alcohol + fragrance-free, vegan + cruelty free. Suitable for all skin types.
BACKED BY SCIENCE: Efficacy is the new luxury. That's why BYOMA delivers clinically-proven formulas backed by science + powered by actives. When we stop stripping our skin + start boosting our barrier, we find the key to balanced, brighter skin.

products.description:
SPF 70 broad spectrum sunscreen lotion delivers high UVA/UVB protection for daily use; water resistant for up to 80 minutes to help guard skin during outdoor activities. Apply 15 minutes before sun exposure and reapply as directed.
Lightweight, oil-free, non-comedogenic Dry-Touch formula absorbs quickly for most users, leaving an ultra-light feel. Finish may vary; some may notice a slight sheen or visible white cast, especially on medium to dark skin tones.
Oxybenzone-free, Hawaii Act 104 compliant, PABA-free body sunscreen; powered by Helioplex technology to provide stable protection against aging UVA and burning UVB rays while helping defend skin from environmental stressors.
Convenient 3 fl oz travel size is TSA compliant and easy to pack in carry-ons, gym bags, or backpacks; a portable sunscreen lotion for on-the-go protection at the beach, park, or commute without weighing down your routine.
Trusted by dermatologists, this formula includes antioxidant Vitamin E for added defense. For best results, reapply at least every 2 hours and after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating; a minority may experience irritation—patch test if unsure.

products.description: Help protect skin from sun damage and fight pollution and dryness with Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Hydrating Water Gel Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Sunscreen and hyaluronic acid. Suitable for all skin types, this water gel daily face moisturizer helps fight the signs of tired, dull-looking skin. It contains broad spectrum SPF 25 UVA/UVB sunscreen boosted with a complex of purified hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in the skin that binds to water and holds it in. The hydrating water gel sunscreen also contains antioxidants, known to help fight daily aggressors like pollution. The lightweight, non-comedogenic, alcohol-, and oil-free formula can be applied alone or under makeup, making Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Water Gel SPF 25 the perfect addition to your daily skincare routine. Designed with the Earth in mind. We've removed the window and plastic tray from this carton for easier recycling.

features: ORIGINAL SPF 50 SUNSCREEN SPRAY . This is the stuff we use every day. The sunscreen that started it all and smells like summer. We wanted a sunscreen to protect those who live and love in the sun, so we made it

MOISTURIZING SUN PROTECTION. Dermatologist and Sonny approved, this non-comedogenic sunscreen delivers UVA/UVB protection and is packed with Vitamin E. Our water-resistant and Hawaii 104 Act Compliant SPF 50 Spray is great for all skin types

HOW TO USE. 15 minutes before sun exposure, apply liberally to all areas of the skin and avoid the eye area. For best results, reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating. Sonny's Tip: Apply every 2 hours for maximum sun protection

PROTECT YOUR SKIN. The key to practicing safe sun is to protect and moisturize your skin. Our Original Sunscreen line is Oxybenzone, Octinoxate, Gluten, Cruelty and Paraben Free to ensure a fun day in the sun

TRUST THE BUM. What does that mean? It means trust us, the ones who live on the beach and need products that work on the most intense days in the sun. The simple truth is, when you make products to protect the ones you love, you make ‘em better
FSA/HSA eligible and meets FDA requirements for sun protection, giving you peace of mind while you protect your skin

products.description: Blistex Medicated Lip Balm helps prevent dryness and chapping with an easy glide formula that also soothes irritated lips. Made with three long-lasting protectants and SPF 15 for sun protection, this lip balm is exactly what you need for daily lip care. It seals in lip moisture to prevent drying of lip tissue. Temporarily protects and helps relieve chapped or cracked lips. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure and reapply at least every two hours. Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating. Ask a doctor before using on children under two years of age. For external use only.

SPF SUN PROTECTION: This lip moisturizer uses SPF 15 to provide sun protection to help prevent sun burn while outdoors for an extended period.
IDEAL DAILY LIP CARE: Crafted with three long-lasting protectants, this lip treatment is the perfect daily care for your lips to feel and look healthier during both hot summers and bitter winters.
SIMPLE TO USE: Apply this hydrating lip balm liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure and reapply at least every 2 hours.
